title: accidentally bought a 4th quinn
body: 4 quinn's of the same type. can i sell it or will it forever sit there?

replies.body: i read the title and though you meant the champ, so my 1st reaction was wtf lol
same here, gonna say this guy must really love that champ

I'm actually a bit curious how you managed this, as the client normally won't even let you buy more than 3.

Are you sure you have 3+ of the exact same quint? (And not for example, 3 tier 3 quints of whatever type, and 1 tier 2 quint of the same type?)
I have 10 armor seals. Don't trust the client!

> [{quoted}](name=Mysticman89,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OQFbUsJz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-10T01:37:13.763+0000)
>
> I'm actually a bit curious how you managed this, as the client normally won't even let you buy more than 3.
> 
> Are you sure you have 3+ of the exact same quint? (And not for example, 3 tier 3 quints of whatever type, and 1 tier 2 quint of the same type?)

Sometimes it glitches out. I have 10x of some of my runes.

It's not possible to refund your quintessences through the client, so you'll need to reach out to our specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get this resolved as quickly as possible.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OQFbUsJz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-09T23:29:42.069+0000)
>
> It's not possible to refund your quintessences through the client, so you'll need to reach out to our specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get this resolved as quickly as possible.

Thank you, I will do that now.
wait i thought you couldn't actually do that. am pretty sure when you buy the amount of runes slots. you can't buy them anymore
